title: Artists residency and exhibition in Myymälä2 Helsinki
description: Dare to Care members are going to Helsinki for a residency about artists' mental health.

links.linktext: Please visit Myymälä2 webpage for further information

details: From June 26th to July 2nd, Dare to Care artists Miriam Poletti, Ania Duldiier and Cami Ruohonen are taking part in a residency in Myymälä2 Gallery in Helsinki.
The residency and the final exhibitions are curated by Dare to Care art collective with the help of Ramiro Camelo, curator and gallerist.

title: Mental Health Europe Campaign
description: Our collaboration with MHE to speak up about artists’ mental health.

links.linktext: You can read the full interview on MHE website
You can visit MHE Instagram page to see all our posts

details: In January 2022 Dare to Care began a collaboration with Mental Health Europe. Through their Instagram platform, the artists of our collective shared artworks and reflections on their experience with mental health as art workers.
The posts have been published between February and April 2023.

As part of the visual campaign, an interview was published on the official MHE website in which members of the collective talk about how Dare to Care was founded, their motivations in participating in the project, its goals and its advocacy.
